title: Accountability
children: We are accountable to each other and to those we serve, acknowledging and reflecting on our actions, and identifying solutions to maximize our impact.

title: Integrity
children: We show our integrity by leading, operating, and communicating openly with those we serve.

title: Innovation
children: We actively seek opportunities to create and innovate to improve outcomes across our facilities, services, and activities.

title: Community
children: We identify the unique needs of our community and intentionally act to create a culture of belonging for all who enter our space.

title: Fun
children: We enjoy what we do. We strive to share our joy and passion with those around us to instill a fun, welcoming and positive environment in the U-SU.

title: Connection
children: We prioritize genuine connections with all in our community, enabling us to appreciate the unique value in each other and amplify our successes as a team.
